SEARCH
Package farm.sales.transaction

Class CategorisedTransaction

Object
Transaction
CategorisedTransaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialSaleTransaction
public class CategorisedTransaction extends Transaction
A transaction that keeps track of what was purchased and by whom.

A transaction has an associated customer and thus their cart to keep track of active purchases.

A transaction exists in either one of two states. Finalised where it is no longer open for modification and instead represents a past sale that has been completed and receipt generated. Or active, where products can be actively added to the customer cart and the receipt is not yet ready.

An extension on the basic transaction, which allows products to be sorted by type within a transaction.

Component of Stage 1.

    • getPurchasesByType

      public Map<Barcode,List<Product>> getPurchasesByType()
      Retrieves all products associated with the transaction, grouped by type. This is either everything the bought if the transaction is finalised or the products currently in their cart.
      Returns:
      the grouped products in the transaction.

    • getPurchaseSubtotal

      public int getPurchaseSubtotal(Barcode type)
      Determines the total price for the provided product type, associated with the transaction.
      Parameters:
      type - the product type.
      Returns:
      the total price for all instances of that product type associated with the transaction.
